title: Arcade Riven Death noise plays over and over when you die
body: So recently, I was playing Riven with skin, Arcade Riven. When I died, her death sound was played over and over, not her KO, but her moaning for like 5 seconds and then it would go away. And then it would always do it when I died with Arcade Riven(I don't know if it happens to her other skins tho).

replies.body: Not a bug. The skin is based off arcade fighting games. When a character dies their cry echoes for a bit. Riven's death is meant to mimic that.

Hey there! Thanks for the post! Can confirm - Arcade Riven's death is working as intended :) as ImSeahorsing pointed out, her death VO effort has been processed to deliberately reference the somewhat heavy-handed and tacky audio design of the fighting games of yore than we grew up on! It's a bit dated sounding to our 2017 gamer ears, buuut isn't that part of what the Arcade line is all about? :D
